org.gearvrf.scene_objects

Class GVRTextViewSceneObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gearvrf.GVRHybridObject
      • org.gearvrf.GVRSceneObject
        • org.gearvrf.scene_objects.GVRTextViewSceneObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class GVRTextViewSceneObject
extends GVRSceneObject

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GVRTextViewSceneObject(GVRContext gvrContext, GVRActivity gvrActivity)
      Shows a TextView on a scene object with both view's default height and width and quad's default height and width.

      Shows a TextView on a scene object.

      Shows a TextView on a scene object with view default height and width.
      GVRTextViewSceneObject(GVRContext gvrContext, GVRMesh mesh, GVRActivity gvrActivity, int viewWidth, int viewHeight, java.lang.CharSequence text)
      Shows a TextView on a scene object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GVRTextViewSceneObject

        public GVRTextViewSceneObject(GVRContext gvrContext,
                              GVRMesh mesh,
                              GVRActivity gvrActivity,
                              int viewWidth,
                              int viewHeight,
                              java.lang.CharSequence text)
        Shows a TextView on a scene object.
        Parameters:
        gvrContext - current GVRContext
        mesh - A GVRMesh - see GVRContext.loadMesh(org.gearvrf.GVRAndroidResource) and GVRContext.createQuad(float, float). Please note that this mesh controls the size of your scene object, and it is independent of the size of the internal TextView: a large mismatch between the scene object's size and the view's size will result in 'spidery' or 'blocky' text.
        gvrActivity - a GVRActivity
        viewWidth - Width of the TextView
        viewHeight - Height of the TextView
        text - CharSequence to show on the textView

      • GVRTextViewSceneObject

        public GVRTextViewSceneObject(GVRContext gvrContext,
                              GVRActivity gvrActivity,
                              float width,
                              float height,
                              int viewWidth,
                              int viewHeight,
                              java.lang.CharSequence text)
        Shows a TextView on a scene object.
        Parameters:
        gvrContext - current GVRContext
        gvrActivity - a GVRActivity
        width - Scene object height, in GVRF scene graph units. Please note that your scene object's size, is independent of the size of the internal TextView: a large mismatch between the scene object's size and the view's size will result in 'spidery' or 'blocky' text.
        height - Scene object's width, in GVRF scene graph units.
        viewWidth - Width of the TextView
        viewHeight - Height of the TextView
        text - CharSequence to show on the textView

      • GVRTextViewSceneObject

        public GVRTextViewSceneObject(GVRContext gvrContext,
                              GVRMesh mesh,
                              GVRActivity gvrActivity,
                              java.lang.CharSequence text)
        Shows a TextView on a scene object with view default height and width.
        Parameters:
        gvrContext - current GVRContext
        mesh - a GVRMesh - see GVRContext.loadMesh(org.gearvrf.GVRAndroidResource) and GVRContext.createQuad(float, float) Please note that this mesh controls the size of your scene object, and it is independent of the size of the internal TextView: a large mismatch between the scene object's size and the view's size will result in 'spidery' or 'blocky' text.
        gvrActivity - a GVRActivity
        text - CharSequence to show on the textView

      • GVRTextViewSceneObject

        public GVRTextViewSceneObject(GVRContext gvrContext,
                              GVRActivity gvrActivity,
                              float width,
                              float height,
                              java.lang.CharSequence text)
        Shows a TextView on a scene object with view's default height and width.
        Parameters:
        gvrContext - current GVRContext
        gvrActivity - a GVRActivity
        width - Scene object height, in GVRF scene graph units. Please note that your scene object's size, is independent of the size of the internal TextView: a large mismatch between the scene object's size and the view's size will result in 'spidery' or 'blocky' text.
        height - Scene object's width, in GVRF scene graph units.
        text - CharSequence to show on the textView

      • GVRTextViewSceneObject

        public GVRTextViewSceneObject(GVRContext gvrContext,
                              GVRActivity gvrActivity,
                              java.lang.CharSequence text)
        Shows a TextView on a scene object with both view's default height and width and quad's default height and width.
        Parameters:
        gvrContext - current GVRContext
        gvrActivity - a GVRActivity
        text - CharSequence to show on the textView

      • GVRTextViewSceneObject

        public GVRTextViewSceneObject(GVRContext gvrContext,
                              GVRActivity gvrActivity)
        Shows a TextView on a scene object with both view's default height and width and quad's default height and width. The initial text will be the private DEFAULT_TEXT constant, or "".
        Parameters:
        gvrContext - current GVRContext
        gvrActivity - a GVRActivity

        Get the current text, as a String. This is a convenience function, 100% equivalent to getText() .toString()
